pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Efficient Swiss Army Knife for Population Genomic Analyses // Provides efficient tools for population genomics data analysis, able to process individual loci, large sets of loci, or whole genomes. PopGenome DOI:10.1093/molbev/msu136 not only implements a wide range of population genetics statistics, but also facilitates the easy implementation of new algorithms by other researchers. PopGenome is optimized for speed via the seamless integration of C code.
